title: Oxtail Stew
rating: "Season the oxtail and then sear it on both sides. Dice your onion and carrots
reviews: then put everything in the pressure cooker. Cook on high pressure for 45 minutes."

title: Good Steak
reviews: then finish it in a pan while basting with butter
column10: and rosemary. Let rest for 10 minutes and serve with flaky sea salt and black pepper."
